[Information]

 

Stemless Wine Glasses

Clear, convenient and so very classy! Our clear plastic wine glasses will impart an air of luxury to your daily dining, wine tasting parties, weddings, cocktail parties, and other celebratory events. Crystal clear plastic construction in classy stemless cylinder shape is elegantly highlighted by shiny metallic gold rim for an added look of luxury. Use our splendid disposable champagne cups to share the toast of festivity with your friends and family.

Gold Rimmed Design

Serve with style with our catchy collection of sophisticated Gold Rimmed Wine Glasses that offer the convenience of disposability with the charm of crystal clear plastic that mimics the refinement of real glass. Contemporary shape and sleek metallic rim add to the regal charm of these stemless champagne flutes, making them perfect for high-end events and posh parties.

     

Wine Goblets

Transform your conventional dining experience into an elegant affair with these classy goblets fashioned in contemporary design and chic shape. Your guests will be startled and awe-struck on the sophisticated presentation of these top-notch glasses. Sturdy plastic material lets you serve your favorite beverages without spilling or leaking. The attribute of disposability makes the cleanup time a breeze for any occasion.

 

Additional Information:

  • Great for serving wines, specialty drinks, or water at restaurants, bars, and catered events
  • WARNING: Not Microwave or Dishwasher Safe
